title: The Pan American Clipper Recipe
full_text:
The Pan American Clipper Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Calvados
or other
apple brandy
1/2
ounce
fresh lime juice
1/2
ounce
pomegranate grenadine
3
dashes
absinthe
Thin strip
of
lime zest
, for garnish
Directions
Combine liquid ingredients in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well until chilled, about 10 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass; garnish with lime zest.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, strainer
Brandy & Cognac
